column4: BRIEF-DLSI Unit Acquires MBT In Switzerland

column4: BRIEF-Russia's MTS says Q1 net profit up 23.6 pct y/y
column5: May 23 (Reuters) - Russian mobile phone operator MTS says:
column6: * Q1 2018 net profit at 15.4 billion roubles ($250 million), taking into account the effect from the adoption of new IFRS standards, vs. 12.5 billion roubles in Q1 2017
column7: * Q1 revenue at 107.9 billion roubles, up 3.1 percent year on year
column8: * Q1 adjusted OIBDA at 52.1 billion roubles, up 24.6 percent year on year
column9: * Q1 adjusted OIBDA margin at 48.3 percent vs. 40.0 percent in Q1 2017
column10: * Free cash flow at 13.9 billion roubles, down 39.1 percent year on year
column11: * MTS believes that compliance with the data storage law could result in an additional investment of 60 billion roubles over five years Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: ($1 = 61.6795 roubles) (Reporting by Moscow Newsroom)
